Shucky's Sweets

Here you will find a list of our cake flavors, icings and filling flavors!

Flavorings

    "Basic" Flavors:
  • Vanilla-white
  • Yellow
  • Chocolate
  • Funfetti
  • Red Velvet
  • Lemon
  • Marble
  • Almond-white

    • "Premium" Flavors- Additional $5.00 per Tier:

  • Cookies n' Cream
  • Carrot Cake
  • Chocolate Chip
  • Apple Butter Spice
  • Gingerbread
  • Pumpkin Spice
  • Pear-Ginger
  • Maple-Bacon
  • White Chocolate
  • Orange Dreamsicle
  • Fresh Strawberry
  • Coconut
  • Lemon-Rosemary Olive Oil
  • White tea & Honey
  • Pina Colada

    • Vegan Options- Additional $10.00 to your selected cake size, listed on the pricing page. Current Flavors are Vanilla, Almond, Chocolate and Carrot.
    Gluten-Free Options- Additional $10.00 to your selected cake size, listed on the pricing page. Current Flavors are Vanilla, Almond, Chocolate and Lemon. All traditional fruit compote and buttercreams are Gluten-Free.

    Additional "Basic" Fillings- $5.00 per tier:

     **COMPOTES**
  • Strawberry
  • Raspberry
  • Blueberry
  • Cherry
  • Pineapple
  • Peach
  • Blackberry
    • ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  • Chocolate Buttercream
  • Strawberry Buttercream
  • Mint Buttercream, great with chocolate cake.
  • Lavender Buttercream, great with lemon cake.

    • Additional "Premium" Fillings- $10.00 per tier:
  • Malted Milkball Buttercream
  • Cookies N' Cream Buttercream
  • Pumpkin Spice Buttercream
  • Nutella Buttercream
  • Apple Pie Compote
  • Chocolate Ganache
  • Chocolate Mocha
  • Dulce De Leche
  • German Chocolate
  • Edible Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
  • Peanut Butter Fudge

**If there is a flavor that you have in mind that isn't listed, feel free to ask me!
